item.title: [pi] please help i need to add a custom item in [pi]
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

i don’t think you helped him at all lol.

1.for the models add them in the RAW folder, if you do not have such folder make one
2.make sure preloading is enabled(client class and search for preloadingmodels() or something like that. and remove the //)
3.go to item_def or item_def2 and add the ints
4.server sided add the item id and stats.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] please help i need to add a custom item in [pi]

item.title: [pi] please help i need to add a custom item in [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Find the…

Item model, if not in correct positioning, use dat editor(model editor) add an rs-char and place it into the right hand holding wep. dat maker make dat, set the prosps to 10.

Find the drop model, (can also be used as inv model) place that in there after using the dat maker and turned it dat.

Find the ints or make them

refact = itemdef

non = I forgotten, been too long.

Server sided, item Id will be where you added the ints, give it some stats 2h or what anims etc. And done, SilentCJ posted a tut on adding models. LOOK AT IT.

Read full topic
